entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mix AsSingleQuery / AsSplitQuery #26244
  • Cosmos: FromSql allows omitting properties from the projection #26243
  • EF sets Console.Foreground non atomically with Console.Write #26249

Closed

  • Owned entity not loaded if PK has a value converter #26116
    6.0.0
  • ObjectDisposedException on retrieval of a pooled DbContext #26202
  • Always encrypted feature is not working when inserting null value for property of type decimal? due to failure when calling sp_describe_parameter_encryption #24426
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0] Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient to 2.1.4 #26248
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 7.5.8 to 8.0.3 #26246
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [5.0.x] Fix context pooling concurrency issue #26241
    Servicing-consider, 5.0.x

Merged

  • [6.0] Query: Throw for FromSql+Any pattern which has been mutated #26211
  • [6.0] Use correct value comparer for generated FK properties #26240
  • [6.0] Fix context pooling concurrency issue #26226

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26237
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [6.0] Test changes to make sure applicationName is set when using new template pattern #26204
    blocked
  • [6.0] Mark internal the ValueConverter constructors that allow conversion of nulls #26232
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.0
